com.js.huffman.io

Class BitInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FileInputStream
        • com.js.huffman.io.BitInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class BitInputStream
extends FileInputStream
    Provides functionality for writing individual bits to a file.
    Author:
    jack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BitInputStream(File file)
      Creates a new BitInputStream, suitable for reading bits

      • BitInputStream

        public BitInputStream(File file)
               throws FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new BitInputStream, suitable for reading bits

    • Method Detail

      • readByte

        public NodeKey[] readByte()
        Read a byte contained in this ByteBuffer.
        Returns:
        a NodeKey[] representing the bits in this byte, or null if no bytes are available to read.

      • setEmptyBits

        public void setEmptyBits(int emptyBits)
        Sets the quantity of 'empty bits' in the final byte. These empty bits are then ignored by the BitInputStream.
        Parameters:
        emptyBits -

      • setFileChannel

        public final void setFileChannel()
        Set the FileChannel for IO.

        Returns:
        metadata
